metadata.synopsis: Dialog with disgusied redcap in BM.  Pirate is in human form and drunk.

0.speaker: Flaming Pete
0.text: It's three sheets to the wind or nothing, lads!
0.context: NodeContext: Hammered drunk, suggesting they all get drunk

1.speaker: Flaming Pete
1.text: You know Captain Grisly? She glared at me once - nearly pissed myself. It was amazing.
